LIBRARY ieee;
USE ieee.std_logic_1164.all;
USE ieee.std_logic_arith.all;

ENTITY c3_t3_button_debounce IS
   PORT(
      btn         : IN     std_logic;
      clk         : IN     std_logic;
      rst_n       : IN     std_logic;
      btn_pressed : OUT    std_logic
   );

-- Declarations

END c3_t3_button_debounce ;

--
-- VHDL Architecture alien_game_lib.c3_t3_button_debounce.fsm
--
-- Created:
--          by - USER.UNKNOWN (QUANG-PHAN)
--          at - 20:59:04 05/26/2020
--
-- Generated by Mentor Graphics' HDL Designer(TM) 2019.3 (Build 4)
--
LIBRARY ieee;
USE ieee.std_logic_1164.all;
USE ieee.std_logic_arith.all;

ARCHITECTURE fsm OF c3_t3_button_debounce IS

   TYPE STATE_TYPE IS (
      init,
      s0,
      wait_for_1st_osci,
      wait_for_2nd_osci,
      accepted_1
   );

   -- Declare current and next state signals
   SIGNAL current_state : STATE_TYPE;
   SIGNAL next_state : STATE_TYPE;

   -- Declare Wait State internal signals
   SIGNAL csm_timer : std_logic_vector(17 DOWNTO 0);
   SIGNAL csm_next_timer : std_logic_vector(17 DOWNTO 0);
   SIGNAL csm_timeout : std_logic;
   SIGNAL csm_to_s0 : std_logic;
   SIGNAL csm_to_wait_for_1st_osci : std_logic;
   SIGNAL csm_to_wait_for_2nd_osci : std_logic;

   -- Declare any pre-registered internal signals
   SIGNAL btn_pressed_int : std_logic ;

BEGIN

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   clocked_proc : PROCESS (
      clk,
      rst_n
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   BEGIN
      IF (rst_n = '0') THEN
         current_state <= init;
         csm_timer <= (OTHERS => '0');
         -- Default Reset Values
         btn_pressed <= '0';
      ELSIF (clk'EVENT AND clk = '1') THEN
         current_state <= next_state;
         csm_timer <= csm_next_timer;
         -- Registered output assignments
         btn_pressed <= btn_pressed_int;
      END IF;
   END PROCESS clocked_proc;

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   nextstate_proc : PROCESS (
      btn,
      csm_timeout,
      current_state
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   BEGIN
      -- Default assignments to Wait State entry flags
      csm_to_s0 <= '0';
      csm_to_wait_for_1st_osci <= '0';
      csm_to_wait_for_2nd_osci <= '0';
      CASE current_state IS
         WHEN init =>
            IF (btn = '0') THEN
               next_state <= init;
            ELSIF (btn = '1') THEN
               next_state <= wait_for_1st_osci;
               csm_to_wait_for_1st_osci <= '1';
            ELSE
               next_state <= init;
            END IF;
         WHEN s0 =>
            IF (csm_timeout = '1') THEN
               next_state <= wait_for_2nd_osci;
               csm_to_wait_for_2nd_osci <= '1';
            ELSE
               next_state <= s0;
            END IF;
         WHEN wait_for_1st_osci =>
            IF (csm_timeout = '1' AND (btn = '1')) THEN
               next_state <= accepted_1;
            ELSE
               next_state <= wait_for_1st_osci;
            END IF;
         WHEN wait_for_2nd_osci =>
            IF (csm_timeout = '1' AND (btn = '0')) THEN
               next_state <= init;
            ELSIF (csm_timeout = '1' AND (btn = '1')) THEN
               next_state <= accepted_1;
            ELSE
               next_state <= wait_for_2nd_osci;
            END IF;
         WHEN accepted_1 =>
            next_state <= s0;
            csm_to_s0 <= '1';
         WHEN OTHERS =>
            next_state <= init;
      END CASE;
   END PROCESS nextstate_proc;

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   output_proc : PROCESS (
      current_state
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   BEGIN
      -- Default Assignment
      btn_pressed_int <= '0';

      -- Combined Actions
      CASE current_state IS
         WHEN init =>
            btn_pressed_int <= '0';
         WHEN accepted_1 =>
            btn_pressed_int <= '1';
         WHEN OTHERS =>
            NULL;
      END CASE;
   END PROCESS output_proc;

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   csm_wait_combo_proc: PROCESS (
      csm_timer,
      csm_to_s0,
      csm_to_wait_for_1st_osci,
      csm_to_wait_for_2nd_osci
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   VARIABLE csm_temp_timeout : std_logic;
   BEGIN
      IF (unsigned(csm_timer) = 0) THEN
         csm_temp_timeout := '1';
      ELSE
         csm_temp_timeout := '0';
      END IF;

      IF (csm_to_s0 = '1') THEN
         csm_next_timer <= "111000001001101110"; -- no cycles(229999)-1=229998
      ELSIF (csm_to_wait_for_1st_osci = '1') THEN
         csm_next_timer <= "000010011100001111"; -- no cycles(10000)-1=9999
      ELSIF (csm_to_wait_for_2nd_osci = '1') THEN
         csm_next_timer <= "000010011100001111"; -- no cycles(10000)-1=9999
      ELSE
         IF (csm_temp_timeout = '1') THEN
            csm_next_timer <= (OTHERS=>'0');
         ELSE
            csm_next_timer <= unsigned(csm_timer) - '1';
         END IF;
      END IF;
      csm_timeout <= csm_temp_timeout;
   END PROCESS csm_wait_combo_proc;

END fsm;
